name: Limit information system access to authorized users,  processes acting on behalf of authorized users,  or devices (including other information systems).

name: Limit information system access to the types of transactions and functions that authorized users are permitted to execute.

name: Use non-privileged accounts or roles when accessing nonsecurity functions.
description: Use non-privileged accounts or roles when accessing nonsecurity functions.

name: Limit unsuccessful logon attempts.

name: Use session lock with pattern-hiding displays to prevent access and viewing of data after a period of inactivity.

name: Authorize wireless access prior to allowing such connections.
description: Authorize wireless access prior to allowing such connections.

name: Monitor and control remote access sessions.

description: Control the flow of CUI in accordance with approved authorizations.

name: Establish a policy that includes Access Control.
description: Establish a policy that includes Access Control.

name: Protect wireless access using authentication and encryption.
description: Protect wireless access using authentication and encryption.

name: Employ cryptographic mechanisms to protect the confidentiality of remote access sessions.
description: Employ cryptographic mechanisms to protect the confidentiality of remote access sessions.

name: Separate the duties of individuals to reduce the risk of malevolent activity without collusion.
description: Separate the duties of individuals to reduce the risk of malevolent activity without collusion.

name: Prevent non-privileged users from executing privileged functions and capture the execution of such functions in audit logs.
description: Prevent non-privileged users from executing privileged functions and capture the execution of such functions in audit logs.

name: Terminate (automatically) user sessions after a defined condition.
description: Terminate (automatically) user sessions after a defined condition.

name: Control connection of mobile devices.
description: Control connection of mobile devices.

name: Authorize remote execution of privileged commands and remote access to security-relevant information.
description: Authorize remote execution of privileged commands and remote access to security-relevant information.

name: Encrypt CUI on mobile devices and mobile computing platforms.

name: Establish,  maintain,  and resource a plan that includes Access Control.

name: Control information flows between security domains on connected systems.
description: Control information flows between security domains on connected systems.

name: Periodically review and update CUI program access permissions.
description: Periodically review and update CUI program access permissions.

description: Ensure that the actions of individual system users can be uniquely traced to those users so they can be held accountable for their actions.

name: Review audit logs.
description: Review audit logs.

description: Establish a policy that includes Audit and Accountability.

name: Review and update logged events.
description: Review and update logged events.

name: Alert in the event of an audit logging process failure.
description: Alert in the event of an audit logging process failure.

name: Collect audit information (e.g.,  logs) into one or more central repositories.
description: Collect audit information (e.g.,  logs) into one or more central repositories.

name: Protect audit information and audit logging tools from unauthorized access,  modification,  and deletion.
description: Protect audit information and audit logging tools from unauthorized access,  modification,  and deletion.

name: Limit management of audit logging functionality to a subset of privileged users.
description: Limit management of audit logging functionality to a subset of privileged users.

name: Review audit information for broad activity in addition to per-machine activity.

description: Provide security awareness training on recognizing and reporting potential indicators of insider threat.

description: Provide awareness training focused on recognizing and responding to threats from social engineering,  advanced persistent threat actors,  breaches,  and suspicious behaviors; update the training at least annually or when there are significant changes to the threat.

description: Establish and maintain baseline configurations and inventories of organizational systems (including hardware,  software,  firmware,  and documentation) throughout the respective system development life cycles.

description: Track,  review,  approve,  or disapprove,  and log changes to organizational systems.

description: Identify information system users,  processes acting on behalf of users,  or devices.

description: Authenticate (or verify) the identities of those users,  processes,  or devices,  as a prerequisite to allowing access to organizational information systems.

name: Prevent the reuse of identifiers for a defined period.

description: Establish and maintain a security operations center capability that facilitates a 24/7 response capability.

description: Review and measure Incident Response activities for effectiveness.

name: Review and measure Security Assessment activities for effectiveness.
description: Review and measure Security Assessment activities for effectiveness.

name: Standardize and optimize a documented approach for Security Assessment across all applicable organizational units.
description: Standardize and optimize a documented approach for Security Assessment across all applicable organizational units.

name: Document the CMMC practices to implement the Situational Awareness policy.
description: Document the CMMC practices to implement the Situational Awareness policy.

name: Establish a policy that includes Situational Awareness.
description: Establish a policy that includes Situational Awareness.

name: Receive and respond to cyber threat intelligence from information sharing forums and sources and communicate to stakeholders.
description: Receive and respond to cyber threat intelligence from information sharing forums and sources and communicate to stakeholders.

name: Establish,  maintain,  and resource a plan that includes Situational Awareness.
description: Establish,  maintain,  and resource a plan that includes Situational Awareness.

name: Establish and maintain a cyber threat hunting capability to search for indicators of compromise in organizational systems and detect,  track,  and disrupt threats that evade existing controls.
description: Establish and maintain a cyber threat hunting capability to search for indicators of compromise in organizational systems and detect,  track,  and disrupt threats that evade existing controls.

name: Design network and system security capabilities to leverage,  integrate,  and share indicators of compromise.
description: Design network and system security capabilities to leverage,  integrate,  and share indicators of compromise.

name: Review and measure Situational Awareness activities for effectiveness.
description: Review and measure Situational Awareness activities for effectiveness.

name: Standardize and optimize a documented approach for Situational Awareness across all applicable organizational units.
description: Standardize and optimize a documented approach for Situational Awareness across all applicable organizational units.

name: Monitor,  control,  and protect organizational communications (i.e.,  information transmitted or received by organizational information systems) at the external boundaries and key internal boundaries of the information systems.
description: Monitor,  control,  and protect organizational communications (i.e.,  information transmitted or received by organizational information systems) at the external boundaries and key internal boundaries of the information systems.

name: Implement subnetworks for publicly accessible system components that are physically or logically separated from internal networks.
description: Implement subnetworks for publicly accessible system components that are physically or logically separated from internal networks.

name: Prohibit remote activation of collaborative computing devices and provide indication of devices in use to users present at the device.
description: Prohibit remote activation of collaborative computing devices and provide indication of devices in use to users present at the device.

name: Use encrypted sessions for the management of network devices.
description: Use encrypted sessions for the management of network devices.

name: Document the CMMC practices to implement the System and Communications Protection policy.
description: Document the CMMC practices to implement the System and Communications Protection policy.

name: Establish a policy that includes System and Communications Protection.
description: Establish a policy that includes System and Communications Protection.

name: Employ FIPS-validated cryptography when used to protect the confidentiality of CUI.
description: Employ FIPS-validated cryptography when used to protect the confidentiality of CUI.

name: Employ architectural designs,  software development techniques,  and systems engineering principles that promote effective information security within organizational systems.
description: Employ architectural designs,  software development techniques,  and systems engineering principles that promote effective information security within organizational systems.

name: Separate user functionality from system management functionality.
description: Separate user functionality from system management functionality.

name: Prevent unauthorized and unintended information transfer via shared system resources.
description: Prevent unauthorized and unintended information transfer via shared system resources.

name: Deny network communications traffic by default and allow network communications traffic by exception (i.e.,  deny all,  permit by exception).
description: Deny network communications traffic by default and allow network communications traffic by exception (i.e.,  deny all,  permit by exception).

name: Prevent remote devices from simultaneously establishing non-remote connections with organizational systems and communicating via some other connection to resources in external networks (i.e.,  split tunneling).
description: Prevent remote devices from simultaneously establishing non-remote connections with organizational systems and communicating via some other connection to resources in external networks (i.e.,  split tunneling).

name: Implement cryptographic mechanisms to prevent unauthorized disclosure of CUI during transmission unless otherwise protected by alternative physical safeguards.
description: Implement cryptographic mechanisms to prevent unauthorized disclosure of CUI during transmission unless otherwise protected by alternative physical safeguards.

name: Terminate network connections associated with communications sessions at the end of the sessions or after a defined period of inactivity.
description: Terminate network connections associated with communications sessions at the end of the sessions or after a defined period of inactivity.

name: Establish and manage cryptographic keys for cryptography employed in organizational systems.
description: Establish and manage cryptographic keys for cryptography employed in organizational systems.

name: Control and monitor the use of mobile code.
description: Control and monitor the use of mobile code.

name: Control and monitor the use of Voice over Internet Protocol (VoIP) technologies.
description: Control and monitor the use of Voice over Internet Protocol (VoIP) technologies.

name: Protect the authenticity of communications sessions.
description: Protect the authenticity of communications sessions.

name: Protect the confidentiality of CUI at rest.
description: Protect the confidentiality of CUI at rest.

name: Implement Domain Name System (DNS) filtering services.
description: Implement Domain Name System (DNS) filtering services.

name: Implement a policy restricting the publication of CUI on externally owned,  publicly accessible websites (e.g.,  forums,  LinkedIn,  Facebook,  Twitter).
description: Implement a policy restricting the publication of CUI on externally owned,  publicly accessible websites (e.g.,  forums,  LinkedIn,  Facebook,  Twitter).

name: Establish,  maintain,  and resource a plan that includes System and Communications Protection.
description: Establish,  maintain,  and resource a plan that includes System and Communications Protection.

name: Employ physical and logical isolation techniques in the system and security architecture and/or where deemed appropriate by the organization.
description: Employ physical and logical isolation techniques in the system and security architecture and/or where deemed appropriate by the organization.

name: Utilize threat intelligence to proactively block DNS requests from reaching malicious domains.
description: Utilize threat intelligence to proactively block DNS requests from reaching malicious domains.

name: Employ mechanisms to analyze executable code and scripts (e.g.,  sandbox) traversing Internet network boundaries or other organizationally defined boundaries.
description: Employ mechanisms to analyze executable code and scripts (e.g.,  sandbox) traversing Internet network boundaries or other organizationally defined boundaries.

name: Isolate administration of organizationally defined high-value critical network infrastructure components and servers.
description: Isolate administration of organizationally defined high-value critical network infrastructure components and servers.

name: Utilize a URL categorization service and implement techniques to enforce URL filtering of websites that are not approved by the organization.
description: Utilize a URL categorization service and implement techniques to enforce URL filtering of websites that are not approved by the organization.

name: Review and measure System and Communications Protection activities for effectiveness.
description: Review and measure System and Communications Protection activities for effectiveness.

name: Configure monitoring systems to record packets passing through the organization's Internet network boundaries and other organizationally defined boundaries.
description: Configure monitoring systems to record packets passing through the organization's Internet network boundaries and other organizationally defined boundaries.

name: Employ organizationally defined and tailored boundary protections in addition to commercially available solutions.
description: Employ organizationally defined and tailored boundary protections in addition to commercially available solutions.

name: Enforce port and protocol compliance.
description: Enforce port and protocol compliance.

name: Standardize and optimize a documented approach for System and Communications Protection across all applicable organizational units.
description: Standardize and optimize a documented approach for System and Communications Protection across all applicable organizational units.
